rooms.description: A welcoming space that leads into the living areas, designed for a smooth flow in accordance with Vastu principles. The entrance is oriented towards the east or north as recommended.
A spacious area for relaxation and entertainment. It features large windows on the south and west sides to allow natural light while respecting Vastu guidelines.
Integrated with the living room or as a separate space adjacent to it. The dining area is strategically placed near the entrance for easy access, following traditional layout norms.
Efficient industrial kitchen design with modern appliances and ample counter space, located in a well-ventilated area away from the main entrance as per Vastu recommendations.
A private sanctuary designed for rest. The bedroom is positioned on the north side to harness positive energy and ensure privacy, in line with Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the master bedroom for convenience, ensuring a clear separation from other living spaces. The bathroom includes provisions for plumbing that adhere to local building norms.

openings.description: A double door entrance providing access from the street with adequate clearance and security features.
Large windows to allow ample natural light while ensuring privacy through proper placement according to Vastu guidelines.
Windows designed to invite positive energy as per Vastu principles and provide cross ventilation.
Provides access to the rooftop terrace, ensuring a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces. The balcony is designed with safety railings that meet local building standards.

rooftop_terraces.description: A private rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and outdoor activities. It includes seating areas, planters for greenery, and a retractable shading system to ensure comfort.
